finalScreen.detailsChange: If your details change, please contact the couple directly.
finalScreen.subheader: We will be in touch soon!
footer.gettingMarried: Getting married? <2>Find out</2> why awesome couples like <5>{{partners}}</5> use Bridebook to make wedding planning easier.
form.disclaimer: Bridebook does not share your data with third parties.
form.input.label.message: Share your favourite memory about one or both of the couple. (Only visible to couple)
form.input.placeholder.message: E.g. The moment you knew the couple were ‘meant to be’...
page.description: Bridebook makes it easy for couples to gather guest info, find venues and manage wedding plans together.
page.title.hasPartners: {{ partners }} would love your contact info. Please add your details to their Bridebook!
page.title.noPartners: We would love your contact info. Please add your details to our Bridebook!
search.input.bottom.plusOne.info: Can’t find yourself? Contact the couple directly.
sidebar.title: The World's No.1<1></1>Wedding Planning App
subhead.text: ...would love your contact info for their upcoming celebration!
